Html:

public class CXWindsorContainerFacade : ICXContainerFacade
{
......
public IEnumerable<T> ResolveAll<T>()
where T : class
{
return this.container.Kernel.ResolveAll(typeof(T), null) as IEnumerable<T>;
}

"Castle.MicroKernel.IKernel" no definition for "ResolveAll" ?????

Peter

Hi Peter

I have posted binaries in the bin folder. I think our early spikes were using one of the nightly builds that is post the version that is currently released to production.

Glenn,
Can IKernel.ResolveAll method be replaced by IKernel.ResolveServices to use the new version of Castle?

George
I am not sure, but I'll ask Ayende. :)

ResolveServices would work, yes.
Having both is actually a problem, and we will remove one of them soon, probably RemoveAll
